description: BRA/09/G31 -Transf de Mercado p/ Eficiência Energética no Brasil

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: This Enabling Activity project will assist Brazil to prepare the Third National Communication (TNC) to the UNFCCC. The objective is to extend coverage of the annual Brazilian Inventory of Anthropogenic GHGs to period 2000-2010, focusing on the sectors/gases that have a significant share of GHG emissions and/or present a large degree of data uncertainty. New integrated global model for climate change studies and downscaling of global models will be developed to reduce the uncertainties in V&A assessments for different sectors. Brazil’s description of national circumstances will be updated, as well as the steps to be taken or envisaged to implement the Convention. Finally, the project will continue to build institutional capacity for implementing the Convention in Brazil including undertaking activities related to climate change education and awareness.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA10G32-3rd National Communic

title: BRA/10/G32 - Third National Communication to the UNFCCC
